greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Pi * sqrt(2).
comment: Hypotenuse of the right triangle with legs Pi and Pi. - _Zak Seidov_, May 04 2005
Circumference of the circumcircle of the unit square. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Nov 23 2017
Half-perimeter of the closed curve with implicit Cartesian equation x^2 + y^2 = abs(x) + abs(y). - _Stefano Spezia_, Oct 20 2020
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) default(realprecision, 20080); x=Pi*sqrt(2); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b063448.txt", n, " ", d)) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 21 2009
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jul 24 2001
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 05 2007
